// {{{ NX.Date.getFirstDayOfMonth

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @method getFirstDayOfMonth
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(date) {

    var day = (date.getDay() - (date.getDate() - 1)) % 7;

    return (day < 0) ? (day + 7) : day;

};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
